song.title: Medieval Romance
song.info: 001 - Medieval Romance - 002 ______________________ 003 Free Version by JosSs 004 ______________________ 005 100% Inspirated 006 in BasilWar's 007 "Medieval Romace" 008 (Saludos from Spain) 009 Fully dedicated to 010 BasilWar and Vargard. 011 Hey !!! 012 This is my own version 013 hope you like it!!! 014 Hard variations in the 015 original melody are 016 included (sorry...;) 017 ______________________ 018 Yeah!!! It was a very 019 interesting xperience! 020 The same song adapted 021 by diferent artists!!! 022 What are you waiting 4 023 Make your own version 024 and send it to us!!! 025 ______________________ 026 - Contact me at - 027 josss@mixmail.com 028 jose01@mi.madritel.es 029 ICQ 126922412 030 ______________________ 031 032 033 ______________________ 034 Try for my Muzik at 035 ______________________ 036 www.modplug.com 037 www.modarchive.com 038 www.traxinspace.com 039 www.s3m.com 040 041 ______________________ 042 "Medieval Romance" 043 Original melody by 044 - BasilWar - 045 Tracked Trilogy by 046 - BasilWar - 047 - Vargard - 048 - JosSs - 049 ______________________ 050 As Usual, Greetings 051 Goes to 052 ______________________ 053 Anders&Lisa, Norfair 054 PeterSalomonsen 055 Awesome, Ljubo, Luty 056 Frank, ChildOfLillith 057 Topz, Thigco, Bize 058 Michael Lewis, TGsoft 059 Squirrel Havoc, Thorn 060 Mister X, Guidorah 061 Bart, Anders Norin 062 BloodGod, Jens, 063 Modgirly, El Wonder 064 Louigi Verona (;) 065 and all the people 066 around the scene... 067 ______________________ 068 Greatest Greetings 069 Goes To 070 ______________________ 071 Basilwar and Vargard 072 073 Let's Track... 074 ...'Till We Die 075 076 ______________________ 077 Extra Big Kisses 078 Goes to 079 Eva 080 ______________________ 081 Remember... this is 082 only the first try!!! 083 084 Look for futures updts 085 without bugs!!!!!!!!!! 086 ______24 Aug 2001_____ 087 - Loop Added 088 - Some vibratos fixed 089 ______________________ 090 "Medieval Romance" 091 092 100% Tracked in FT209 093 094 22/23 Aug 2001 095 Madrid - Spain 096 20 Channels 097 4 Min 26 Sek 098 ______________________ 099 Hey Rik, there is the 100 Looped version... 101 ______________________
